title: Can't login ( NA
body:
For 2h i'm trying to login to league of legends, i don't get any warnings or messages i only wait and wait and wait, i pass the authentication part, now comes Loading... part where it stucks for very long time and never makes a login ( tried 17 times so far )

i already have done all the things you guys posted on forum, from dns flush, firewall disable, updated everything, still nothing...

replies.body: You might have been having some kind of hiccup within your network when this was going on. Let me know if you still can't get signed into the client and we can get you in touch with our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

bump* 

its not ( NA ) its EUNE
